homeHeader.title: From Gateway to Global Growth — Business Setup in Fujairah Free Zone Made Effortless
homeHeader.description: Starting a business in the UAE can feel overwhelming — piles of paperwork, shifting approvals, and endless formalities that drain time and energy. At One Nexuz, we make Fujairah Free Zone company setup simple, clear, and stress-free. Positioned on the Eastern Coast with unmatched access to the goal trade routes, Fujairah Free Zone opens doors for freelancers, solopreneurs, SMBs, and enterprises alike. With multi-visa packages, zero personal tax, and no mandatory office space, our specialists streamline every step, so you launch faster, stay compliant, and focus on growth while we handle the details.

leftSection_1.title: Why Thousands of Business Owners Choose Fujairah
leftSection_1.description: Fujairah Free Zone offers flexible licensing, low operating costs, and unrivaled access to shipping and logistics routes. Positioned along the Gulf of Oman, it connects businesses directly to international trade corridors, making it a powerful hub for startups, SMEs, and global companies.

items.title: From Limited Options to Total Business Flexibility
items.subTitle: From Limited Options to Total Business Flexibility
items.description: Endless red tape and rising costs often slow business growth. Fujairah Free Zone simplifies company formation with streamlined procedures, affordable packages, and diverse license options, enabling entrepreneurs to reduce setup time and adapt operations easily to market demands.

items.title: Save on Costs, Retain Profit, & Uplift Your Bottom Line
items.subTitle: Save on Costs, Retain Profit, & Uplift Your Bottom Line
items.description: In Fujairah Free Zone, businesses enjoy 0% corporate and personal income taxes along with 100% profit repatriation. This tax-friendly environment ensures stronger margins, allowing you to reinvest earnings into growth, innovation, and market expansion.

items.title: Connect Faster, Ship Smarter, and Grow Beyond Borders
items.subTitle: Connect Faster, Ship Smarter, and Grow Beyond Borders
items.description: Fujairah’s unique location outside the Strait of Hormuz provides direct access to the Indian Ocean, bypassing regional bottlenecks. With proximity to major seaports, international airports, and modern road links, businesses benefit from faster logistics, reduced transit costs, and seamless global trade access.

items.title: From Limited Access to Diverse Global Markets Opportunities
items.subTitle: From Limited Access to Diverse Global Markets Opportunities
items.description: From trading and logistics to services, consultancy, and manufacturing, Fujairah Free Zone supports a broad spectrum of industries. Its adaptable frameworks empower businesses to diversify, pivot, and scale without restrictions — ensuring long-term resilience and growth.

leftSection_5.title: Fujairah Free Zone Company Setup Made Simple in 6 Steps

items.title: Initial Consultation
items.description: We align your goals with Fujairah Free Zone advantages — especially trade, shipping, and logistics — and finalize the right activity license.

items.title: Legal Structure Setup
items.description: Choose between FZE or FZC. We assist in license applications, bundling activities if needed, for a smooth Fujairah Free Zone formation.

items.title: Workspace Selection
items.description: Whether it’s a flexi-desk, shared office, or warehouse facility, Fujairah offers flexible options. We secure the right setup for your operations.

items.title: Visa Processing
items.description: We handle visa applications for investors, employees, and family sponsorships. Fujairah Free Zone allows multiple visas per license to support growth.

items.title: Bank Account Opening
items.description: We help you open a UAE bank account, streamlining transactions and ensuring your Fujairah company is financially ready.

items.title: PRO & Renewals
items.description: Stay compliant with ongoing government and immigration support. We manage renewals, reporting, and PRO services for peace of mind.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What documents do I need to register in Fujairah Free Zone?
items.answer: You’ll need copies of your passport, passport-sized photographs, application forms, and financial documents.

items.question: Do I need to get a local sponsor or partner to setup in FFZA?
items.answer: No, Fujairah free zone offers businesses 100% foreign ownership, meaning you get full strategic control of your business.

items.question: How long does it take to setup my Fujairah Free Zone business?
items.answer: Setting up in FFZA can take 1 to 14 days, depending on your business activity, legal structure, selected free zone, and document readiness. Our expert consultants cutdown processing times in half, helping you get licensed within 3-5 days.

items.question: Do I need to rent a physical office to kickstart my FFZA business?
items.answer: No! You can explore cost-effective alternatives like a flexi-desk and virtual options.

items.question: Can I operate my Fujairah Free Zone business from outside the UAE?
items.answer: Yes, you can manage and operate your FFZA-based business remotely.
